DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate ocular tolerance T1225 1 % 1.5 % eye drop versus vehicle one instillation twice-daily ( morning evening ) , one eye , 3 day ( Day 0 Day 2 ) . To assess azithromycin tear , conjunctiva plasmatic concentration , 3-day treatment period
DOC.brief_title: Study Ocular Safety After Repeated Instillations T1225 1 % 1.5 % Eye Drops Healthy Volunteers
DOC.detailed_description: The aim present study compare ocular tolerance safety repeat instillation T1225 1 % 1.5 % eye drop vehicle ass residual azithromycin concentration tear , ocular conjunctiva plasma sample , approximately 12 hour last Investigational Medicinal Product instillation .
DOC.criteria: Male female age 18 45 year old ; Written inform consent ; Healthy volunteer without subjective ocular symptom ; Normal ocular examination eye ( correct visual acuity > = 6/10 , normal slit lamp examination , tear prism height > 0.1mm , tear breakup time ( BUT ) > = 10 second , lissamine green test score < 4 ) ; Registered , agree register , national register healthy volunteer Ocular trauma , infection inflammation within last 3 month ; number corneal stain punctuation Ocular trauma , infection inflammation within last 3 month ; number corneal stain punctuation > = 5 ; blepharitis , conjunctivitis , uveitis ; contact lens ; topical ocular treatment within last month ; ocular laser within last 3 month ; ocular surgery , include LASIK PRK , within last 12 month ; systemic macrolide within last month ; medication study ( except : paracetamol contraceptive ) .
